categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sirinek was a male Human captain of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he was stationed on the Harrower-class dreadnought Regnant, the flagship of Admiral Harridax Kirill. During the Battle of Corellia the Regnant was infiltrated by Kirill's nemesis the Voidhound and Sirinek was killed trying to stop him from reaching the Admiral.
